about.description: Creating professional Websites with a personal and easy-going touch. I have been working in different countries, from branding and design to developing and coding.

miho.title: Mi-Ho Project
miho.description: A website showcasing MI°HO's offerings, with a focus on user experience and design. Created with React and Bootstrap.

acordaselva.title: Acordaselva Project
acordaselva.description: A family-run farm dedicated to agroecological practices, soil regeneration, and organic seedling production.

verena.title: Verena Eichner Project
verena.description: Rebuilt an old website to make it more modern. Holistic health coaching website integrating Yoga and Ayurveda.

setecores.title: Sete Cores Project
setecores.description: A project in Bahia, Brazil, focused on land rejuvenation through reforestation, cacao cultivation, and sustainable living initiatives.

taskmanager.title: Task Manager
taskmanager.description: A web application designed to help users manage and organize their tasks efficiently. Built with React and Redux Toolkit.

ai.title: AI Image Generator
ai.description: A web application that generates images using OpenAI's API, allowing users to create AI-powered visuals.

pokemon.title: Pokemon Memory Game
pokemon.description: An engaging memory card game featuring Pokémon characters, designed to test and improve memory skills.
